content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello, Juan. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure we can come to an agreement that suits both our needs. Please, make me an offer for the apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm looking for a place that's both affordable and comfortable. Given the size of the apartment, which is 25 square meters, I would like to propose a rental price of 800 Euro per month. What do you think?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Juan, your offer of 800 Euro per month is quite reasonable considering the size of the apartment. However, as a landlord, I am always looking to maximize my gains. Could you perhaps increase your offer slightly?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand your position, Mister Heine. As a student, I'm also trying to manage my expenses wisely. Would you be willing to accept 850 Euro per month? This would help me to keep my budget under control while still compensating you fairly for the apartment.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Juan, your offer of 850 Euro per month is closer to my expectations. However, I believe the market value of this apartment could fetch a slightly higher price. Would you be willing to go up to 900 Euro per month? This would reflect the true value of the property, in my opinion.
name: Heinrich Heine
